name: centaur
description:
This version fixes the event that may generate multiple legs, but there are still a few chances to generate bad shapes.

The effect of vertical plate is better than that of horizontal plate.

Recommended weights for txt2img - 0.3-0.7,Different models have different effects.

High weight may pollute the painting style.
